Uses of Interface
org.forgerock.openidm.core.PropertyAccessor

  • Packages that use PropertyAccessor 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openidm.core
    This package contains the core implementation of the OpenIDM bootstrapping implementation.

    • Uses of PropertyAccessor in org.forgerock.openidm.core

      Classes in org.forgerock.openidm.core that implement PropertyAccessor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FrameworkPropertyAccessor
      A FrameworkPropertyAccessor wraps the BundleContext and accesses all Framework properties.
      class  IdentityServer
      This class defines the core of the Identity Server.
      class  ServicePropertyAccessor
      A ServicePropertyAccessor tracks services with ServiceTracker<Map<String, Object>, Map<String, Object>> and gets the Properties.
      class  SystemPropertyAccessor
      A SystemPropertyAccessor accesses to System properties.
      Methods in org.forgerock.openidm.core with parameters of type PropertyAccessor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IdentityServer IdentityServer.initInstance(PropertyAccessor properties)
      Initialise the singleton IdentityServer instance with the provided PropertyAccessor instance.
      static Object PropertyUtil.substVars(String val, PropertyAccessor propertyAccessor, boolean doEscape)
      This method performs property variable substitution on the specified value.
      static Object PropertyUtil.substVars(String val, PropertyAccessor propertyAccessor, PropertyUtil.Delimiter delimiter, boolean doEscape) 
      Constructors in org.forgerock.openidm.core with parameters of type PropertyAccessor 
      Constructor and Description
